string [] Nitobi.Grid.SelectedRowIds [get, set]

Maintains a list of id values that uniquely represent a given row in the grid. If the Grid contains a KeyColumn, these values should match up to values from that column for each rom. If the grid does not contain a key column, these values represent the row number.

Setting these values on the server side will cause the grid to render the selected rows while the grid is being initialized in the browser. If the user changes the selected rows in the grid, these values will be updated to reflect their selection.

If the grid SelectMode is non, these value is ignored.
